id data_09-04-2020/fold1/test/26-08-2019-paper-1.pdf.json

( O

id data_09-04-2020/fold1/test/26-08-2019-paper-1.pdf.json

section 2
id data_09-04-2020/fold1/test/26-08-2019-paper-1.pdf.json

id data_09-04-2020/fold1/test/26-08-2019-paper-1.pdf.json

. O

id data_09-04-2020/fold1/test/26-08-2019-paper-1.pdf.json

. O

. O
Introduction O

section 0
id data_09-04-2020/fold1/test/08-06-2019-Paper2.pdf.json

difficulty O

goal O

section TITLE
id data_09-04-2020/fold1/test/09-02-2020-1001.2472v1.Second_Order_Nonlinear_Optics_from_First_Principles.pdf.json
Second O
Order O
Nonlinear O
Optics O
from O
First O
Principles O

section ABSTRACT
id data_09-04-2020/fold1/test/09-02-2020-1001.2472v1.Second_Order_Nonlinear_Optics_from_First_Principles.pdf.json
We O
present O
a O
new O
first O
- O
principle O
theory O
for O
the O
calculation O

gap O
, O
which O
increases O
as O
the O
temperature O
is O
lowered O
, O
as O
expected O
for O
inverted O
bands O
. O

section 5
id data_09-04-2020/fold1/test/29-01-2020-part2-1809.06076v1.Infrared_spectroscopic_studies_of_the_topological_properties_in_CaMnSb2.pdf.json
We O
can O
also O
extract O
the O
evolution O
of O
the O
band O
gap O
via O
the O
squared O
absorption O
coefficient O
: O

= O
4ω2κ2/c2 O
, O
( O
2 O
) O

coefficient O

can O

from O

- O

analysis O
of O
R O
( O
ω O
) O
; O
c O
is O
the O
speed O
of O
light O
. O

of O
the O
band O

( O

data O
points O
) O
53 O

E O
( O

) O

) O

2 O
T O
+ O
β O
, O
( O
3 O
) O

( O

) O

0 O

. O

section ABSTRACT
id data_09-04-2020/fold1/test/29-01-2020-part2-1809.07810v1.Control_of_hidden_ground_state_order_in_NdNiO__3_superlattices.pdf.json
The O
combination O
of O
charge O
and O
spin O
degrees O
of O
freedom O
with O
electronic O
correlations O
in O
condensed O
matter O
systems O
leads O
to O
a O
rich O
array O
of O
phenomena O
, O
such O
as O
magnetism O
, O
superconductivity O
, O
and O
novel O
conduction O
mechanisms O
. O

section ABSTRACT
id data_09-04-2020/fold1/test/29-01-2020-part2-1809.07810v1.Control_of_hidden_ground_state_order_in_NdNiO__3_superlattices.pdf.json
While O
such O
phenomena O
are O
observed O
in O
bulk O
materials O
, O
a O

array O
of O
behaviors O
becomes O
possible O
when O

degrees O
of O
freedom O
are O
controlled O
in O

layered O

, O
where O
one O
can O
constrain O
dimensionality O
and O
impose O
interfacial O
boundary O
conditions O
. O

section ABSTRACT
id data_09-04-2020/fold1/test/29-01-2020-part2-1809.07810v1.Control_of_hidden_ground_state_order_in_NdNiO__3_superlattices.pdf.json

, O

a O

from O

section ABSTRACT
id data_09-04-2020/fold1/test/29-01-2020-part2-1809.07810v1.Control_of_hidden_ground_state_order_in_NdNiO__3_superlattices.pdf.json

id data_09-04-2020/fold1/test/29-01-2020-part2-1809.07810v1.Control_of_hidden_ground_state_order_in_NdNiO__3_superlattices.pdf.json

id data_09-04-2020/fold1/test/29-01-2020-part2-1809.07810v1.Control_of_hidden_ground_state_order_in_NdNiO__3_superlattices.pdf.json

section 0
id data_09-04-2020/fold1/test/29-01-2020-part2-1809.07810v1.Control_of_hidden_ground_state_order_in_NdNiO__3_superlattices.pdf.json
The O
combination O
of O
charge O
and O
spin O
degrees O
of O
freedom O
with O
electronic O
correlations O
in O
condensed O
matter O
systems O
leads O

of O
α O
with O
temperature O
becomes O
smaller O
while O
for O
a O
given O
temperature O
α O
decreases O
strongly O
with O
increasing O
pressure O
. O

that O

of O

expansion O

of O

. O

metastable O
state O
requires O
that O

following O
conditions O
between O

> O
0 O
, O
C44 O
> O
0 O
, O

C11 O
+ O
2C12 O
> O
0 O
. O

section 5
id data_09-04-2020/fold1/test/01-01-2020-10.pdf.json

results O
for O

satisfy O

. O

section TITLE
id data_09-04-2020/fold1/test/26-08-2019-paper-11.pdf.json

initio O
study O
of O
thermoelectric O
transport O
properties O
of O
pure O
and O
doped O
quaternary O
compounds O

section ABSTRACT
id data_09-04-2020/fold1/test/26-08-2019-paper-11.pdf.json
Recent O
experiments O
on O
thermoelectric O
characterization O
of O
doped O
quaternary O
compounds O
of O
sattanite O
or O
kesterite O
- O
type O
Cu2ZnSnSe4 O
, O
Cu2ZnSnS4 O
, O
and O
Cu2CdSnSe4 O
, O
show O
promise O
for O
their O
use O
as O
bulk O
thermoelectrics O
. O

section ABSTRACT
id data_09-04-2020/fold1/test/26-08-2019-paper-11.pdf.json
In O
this O
paper O
we O
present O
and O
discuss O
the O
energetic O
, O
electronic O
, O
and O
transport O
properties O
of O
several O
tetrahedrally O
bonded O
quaternary O
compounds O
Cu2QSnX4 B-MATERIAL
, I-MATERIAL
where I-MATERIAL
Q=Zn I-MATERIAL
, I-MATERIAL
Cd I-MATERIAL
; I-MATERIAL
X=S I-MATERIAL
, I-MATERIAL
Se I-MATERIAL
, I-MATERIAL
Te I-MATERIAL
and O
their O
alloyed/doped O
structures O
, O
Cu O
doped O
at O
Q O
sites O
and O
M O
doped O
M O
=Al O
, O
Ga O
, O
In O
at O
Sn O
sites O
, O
for O
elucidating O
their O
thermoelectric O
performance O
. O

section ABSTRACT
id data_09-04-2020/fold1/test/26-08-2019-paper-11.pdf.json
In O
our O
calculations O
, O
using O
density O
- O
functional O
theory O
and O
Boltzmann O
transport O
equations O
, O
we O
determine O
Seebeck O
coefficients O
, O
conductivities O
, O
power O
factors O
, O
a O
simple O
measure O
``maximum'' O
ZT O
for O
each O
compound O
at O
experimentally O
amenable O
doping O
levels O
. O

section ABSTRACT
id data_09-04-2020/fold1/test/26-08-2019-paper-11.pdf.json
Based O
on O
the O
electronic O
- O
structure O
and O
transport O
property O
calculations O
, O
we O
conclude O
that O
the O
base O
compounds O
and O
several O
doped O
compounds O
show O
similar O
potential O
as O
thermoelectric O
materials O
to O
the O
experimentally O
characterized O
one O
. O

id data_09-04-2020/fold1/test/08-06-2019-paper-3.pdf.json

this O
work O
, O
we O
report O
results O
of O

initio O

Carlo O

properties O

of O

( O

= O
Ga O
, O
Ge O
, O
As O
) O
. O

id data_09-04-2020/fold1/test/08-06-2019-paper-3.pdf.json
It O
was O
found O
that O
for O
Pd2MnGa O
and O
Pd2MnAs O
, O
the O
stable O
martensitic O
state O
is O
realized O
on O
the O
contrast O
with O
Pd2MnGe O
. O

section ABSTRACT
id data_09-04-2020/fold1/test/08-06-2019-paper-3.pdf.json
The O
equilibrium O
lattice O
parameters O
for O
the O
series O
of O
Pd2MnZ O
( O
Z O
= O
Ga O
, O

of O
valence O
electrons O
per O
atom O
( O
e/a O
ratio O
) O
. O

id data_09-04-2020/fold1/test/08-06-2019-paper-3.pdf.json

calculated O
total O

moments O

magnetic O
exchange O
parameters O

section 1
id data_09-04-2020/fold1/test/08-06-2019-paper-3.pdf.json

are O

great O

to O

due O
to O

id data_09-04-2020/fold1/test/08-06-2019-paper-3.pdf.json

- O
Heusler O
alloys O
are O
ternary O

systems O
with O
L21 O
crystal O
structure O
and O
are O

from O
a O

X2YZ O
. O
